    • Method Detail

      • getSharedLinks

        public Sharing.GetSharedLinksResult getSharedLinks()
                                            throws Sharing.GetSharedLinksException,
                                                   DbxException
        Returns a list of Sharing.LinkMetadata objects for this user, including collection links. If no path is given or the path is empty, returns a list of all shared links for the current user, including collection links. If a non-empty path is given, returns a list of all shared links that allow access to the given path. Collection links are never returned in this case. Note that the url field in the response is never the shortened URL. This API is not supported for App Folder and filetypes apps.
        Throws:
        Sharing.GetSharedLinksException
        DbxException

      • getSharedLinks

        public Sharing.GetSharedLinksResult getSharedLinks(java.lang.String path)
                                            throws Sharing.GetSharedLinksException,
                                                   DbxException
        Returns a list of Sharing.LinkMetadata objects for this user, including collection links. If no path is given or the path is empty, returns a list of all shared links for the current user, including collection links. If a non-empty path is given, returns a list of all shared links that allow access to the given path. Collection links are never returned in this case. Note that the url field in the response is never the shortened URL. This API is not supported for App Folder and filetypes apps.
        Throws:
        Sharing.GetSharedLinksException
        DbxException

      • createSharedLink

        public Sharing.PathLinkMetadata createSharedLink(java.lang.String path)
                                          throws Sharing.CreateSharedLinkException,
                                                 DbxException
        Create a shared link. If a shared link already exists for the given path, that link is returned. Note that in the returned Sharing.PathLinkMetadata, the url field is the shortened URL if the short_url argument is set to true. This API is not supported for App Folder and filetypes apps.
        Throws:
        Sharing.CreateSharedLinkException
        DbxException

      • createSharedLinkBuilder

        public Sharing.CreateSharedLinkBuilder createSharedLinkBuilder(java.lang.String path)
        Create a shared link. If a shared link already exists for the given path, that link is returned. Note that in the returned Sharing.PathLinkMetadata, the url field is the shortened URL if the short_url argument is set to true. This API is not supported for App Folder and filetypes apps.
